metadata.synopsis: The player walks into the barracks room and disturbs a Flaming Fist who seems to be breaking into a locked chest. During conversation, the player can challenge him, discover the location of his stash, or attempt to persuade him not to flee, and to protect the city.The whole conversation should be in relatively low voice, as he doens't want to wake the others sleeping in the barracks.
metadata.how_to_trigger: BGO_Main_A goto -5; 44; 199Approach / click on the guard

2.speaker: Fist Reynash
2.text: When that army comes, I'll be ready. I promise.

8.speaker: Fist Reynash
8.text: Wh - oh. What do you - what are you doing in here?

107.speaker: Narrator
107.text: *You notice the gnome slip a lockpick into his pocket.*

33.speaker: Fist Reynash
33.text: You're not a Fist. Go on, get out, or - or I'll wake the others!
33.context: InternalNodeContext: Panicking and whispering, trying to avoid waking up his comradesNodeContext: realisation, turning to bluffing - he doesn't want to wake them

9.speaker: Player
9.text: Go ahead. I'll tell them you're funding a ferry ticket with their stolen belongings.

66.speaker: Fist Reynash
66.text: How do you know about that? Did those crooks down the docks send you?

75.speaker: Fist Reynash
75.text: I told them I'll get the money in time. Not my fault they're charging triple. 'Danger money' my arse.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: Great idea. They can deal with you. Guards - wake up!

6.speaker: Player
6.text: How about I do it? Guards - wake up!

73.speaker: Player
73.text: I'm guessing it was your stash I found on the roof, then?

74.speaker: Fist Reynash
74.text: Keep it down! Yes, it's my stash, but it's not - I wasn't - I just needed the gold.
74.context: NodeContext: Panicked, he's been caught out

65.speaker: Player
65.text: I'm looking for the owner of that stash hidden on the roof. Know where I could find them?

97.speaker: Fist Reynash
97.text: You found my stash? Please - don't tell anyone. I just needed some quick gold!

34.speaker: Fist Reynash
34.text: Stash? I - I don't know anything about that. I've been guarding this room the whole time.

50.speaker: Fist Reynash
50.text: You need to leave. Immediately. This is a restricted area. Fists only!

69.speaker: Player
69.text: Hand over the lockpick, you thieving little worm.

80.speaker: Fist Reynash
80.text: Okay! But it's not - it isn't like that! I'm not a criminal! I just needed the gold.
80.context: CinematicNodeContext: Reynahs hands over the lockpick (unseen)

37.speaker: Fist Reynash
37.text: You've got no business being in here, so just clear off.
37.context: NodeContext: anxious, trying to sound commanding

38.speaker: Player
38.text: Sure. If you want me to tell them you were trying to steal their belongings.

59.speaker: Fist Reynash
59.text: I'm no thief! I - I was going to pay it back. Eventually. I just - I needed the gold.

11.speaker: Fist Reynash
11.text: Who do you think you are? Eh? You can't just - just accuse someone of - of being a thief!

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Tell me what you're up to or I'll wake them myself.

99.speaker: Fist Reynash
99.text: Please - that won't be necessary. I - I just needed gold. That's all.

25.speaker: Fist Reynash
25.text: I'm getting out of here, taking a ferry down the coast to get me home.

72.speaker: Fist Reynash
72.text: Those bloody crooks at the docks are charging triple, though. 'Danger money'. It's a joke!
72.context: NodeContext: Pissed off that they're taking advantage

29.speaker: Player
29.text: A thief's a thief. I don't care why you're doing it.

5.speaker: Fist Reynash
5.text: But I have to get away. There's an army coming, trying to kill us all!

0.speaker: Fist Reynash
0.text: No! I mean, I'm just - I quit. Nothing wrong with quitting a job.

26.speaker: Fist Reynash
26.text: My wife said we have to stand and fight and - and I can't! I won't... I'm not made for this.

68.speaker: Player
68.text: You seem capable from where I'm standing.

98.speaker: Fist Reynash
98.text: I'm not a soldier. I only joined for the uniform and a warm bed.

1.speaker: Fist Reynash
1.text: They're better off without me. I'm scared. All I want is to go home.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: Get a grip. You're a soldier - act like one.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: I've heard enough. Guards - I've spotted a thief!

60.speaker: Fist Reynash
60.text: Really? You'll just give it to me?
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player hands over the gold to the gnome (unseen)

76.speaker: Fist Reynash
76.text: Look - hidden up on the roof you'll find all the stuff I stole. You can have it.

81.speaker: Fist Reynash
81.text: Thank you. I'll never forget this. Never.

53.speaker: Player
53.text: Hand over everything you stole, and I'll let you live long enough to run.

56.speaker: Fist Reynash
56.text: All right, all right. It's all hidden up on the roof.

10.speaker: Fist Reynash
10.text: I just wanted to be safe. I'm not a coward. I'm not.

21.speaker: Fist Reynash
21.text: Help! Someone's trying to kill me!

86.speaker: Player
86.text: They've got a point. These are dangerous times to be travelling.

79.speaker: Fist Reynash
79.text: Not by boat! It's the army marching towards us makes things dangerous.

3.speaker: Fist Reynash
3.text: You haven't heard? An army is coming. They're saying it's unstoppable.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I need gold, too. Give me yours, and this goes no further.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I won't tell anyone. For the right price.

35.speaker: Fist Reynash
35.text: 'Course you are. I can't believe they expect me to die protecting lowlifes like you.

20.speaker: Fist Reynash
20.text: My stash is up on the roof. Just take it. I'll find another way to get the gold.

89.speaker: Fist Reynash
89.text: It's over, all right? Finished. Now get out. This is a restricted area.

106.speaker: Fist Reynash
106.text: You already found my stash. That was all I had!
106.context: NodeContext: Stash has been mentioned previously, he's outraged the player wants more still

57.speaker: Player
57.text: I have to report this. You lot - wake up!

24.speaker: Fist Reynash
24.text: Gods, I hope they haven't put up the prices again.

30.speaker: Fist Reynash
30.text: That ferry's my last chance out of here. Bakshi's got to have something that'll cover the rest of my fare.

85.speaker: Fist Reynash
85.text: What are you doing? Get out of my head!

41.speaker: Player
41.text: I can't go yet, I'm waiting on your explanation. Why were you stealing?

58.speaker: Player
58.text: It's not fair to rob your colleagues, no matter how expensive the boat is.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: Why do you need to leave?

94.speaker: Player
94.text: You'll be looked on as a coward for deserting your post.

31.speaker: Fist Reynash
31.text: Go on, get lost. You're not allowed in here.

49.speaker: Fist Reynash
49.text: You'll always have a warm welcome in Cloakwood, stranger. I promise.

96.speaker: Fist Reynash
96.text: This area isn't open for the public. You need to leave.

108.speaker: Fist Reynash
108.text: You shouldn't be in here. This barracks is private.
